text: 7800° Fahrenheit is the second studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and released on 27 March, 1985 through Mercury Records. It went to number 5 in Japan, number 6 in Finland, number 10 in Sweden, number 11 in Switzerland, number 28 in Australia and the United Kingdom and number 37 in the United States. ==Track listing== *Some editions of the album list "To the Fire" as "(I Don't Wanna Fall) to the Fire" == References == Category:1985 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: 7800° Fahrenheit
